title: Insight is 20/20: How To Trust Yourself To Protect Yourself From Narcissistic Abuse & Toxic Relationships
description: The majority of women survivors of toxic relationships do not have histories of significant trauma, nor are they codependent. Instead, they have certain personality traits that make them vulnerable to this relationship abuse.In Insight Is 20/20: How To Trust Yourself To Protect Yourself From Narcissistic Abuse & Toxic Relationships, Chelli Pumphrey's anecdotes, clinical examples, and research teaches you about the signals of your body that can alert you to the dangers of a pathological partner. You'll learn how to prevent, identify, or leave abusive or toxic relationships.Inside, you will receive answers can I tell if my partner is a narcissist or has a personality disorder?What are the signs of narcissistic abuse?Why is it so hard for me to leave my toxic relationship?Why do I keep attracting narcissists and abusive partners?What techniques or tools can help me trust my gut when choosing a partner?Insight is 20/20 is a must-read, debunking the myths associated with narcissistic and toxic partners, opening your eyes to the real reasons that impact your vulnerability, and how to prevent these relationships.
author: Chelli Pumphrey MA LPC
